title: New method drives cellular HIV reservoirs to self-destruct

title_detail.value: New method drives cellular HIV reservoirs to self-destruct

summary: While current therapies for HIV can successfully manage active infection, the virus can survive in tissue reservoirs, including macrophage cells, and remain a persistent problem. Now, scientists have pinpointed a novel angle of attack that could selectively eradicate these viral reservoir cells while leaving healthy cells untouched.
